DataListAction

CepService

properties.name: form
properties.defaultValue:
new FormGroup({
    firstName: new FormControl('', { nonNullable: true, validators: [Validators.required] }),
    lastName: new FormControl('', { nonNullable: true, validators: [Validators.required] }),
    gender: new FormControl('', { nonNullable: true, validators: [Validators.required] }),

    cep: new FormControl('', { nonNullable: true, validators: [Validators.required] }),
    state: new FormControl('', { nonNullable: true, validators: [Validators.required] }),
    street: new FormControl('', { nonNullable: true, validators: [Validators.required] }),
    neighborhood: new FormControl('', { nonNullable: true, validators: [Validators.required] }),
    number: new FormControl('', {
      nonNullable: true,
      validators: [Validators.required, Validators.pattern(/^\d+$/)],
    }),
    complement: new FormControl('', { nonNullable: true }),
  })

components.name: MenuComponent

propertiesClass.name: menuSource

components.name: SelectComponent
SplitButtonComponent
TabsComponent
components.templateData:
<p-tabs [value]="activeTab?.value">
  <p-tablist>
    @for(tab of tabs; track $index) {
      <p-tab
        [value]="tab.value"
        [disabled]="tab.disabled"
        (click)="selectTab($index)"
      >
      {{ tab.label }}
    </p-tab>
    }
  </p-tablist>

  <p-tabpanels>
    @for(tab of tabs; track $index) {
      <p-tabpanel [value]="tab.value">
        @if($index === activeIndex) {
          <ng-container *ngComponentOutlet="tab.component"></ng-container>
        }
      </p-tabpanel>
    }
  </p-tabpanels>
</p-tabs>

components.name: UserAddressTabComponent
components.templateData: @if (store.number.invalid && store.number.touched) { Número é obrigatório e deve conter apenas dígitos }

components.name: UserDataTabComponent

propertiesClass.name: genderOptions
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
[
      { label: 'Masculino', value: 'M' },
      { label: 'Feminino', value: 'F' },
      { label: 'Outro', value: 'O' },
      { label: 'Prefiro não responder', value: 'N' },
    ]

components.name: UserListPage
components.templateData:
<app-card
  header="Lista de usuários"
>
  <app-list 
    [items]="[
      { name: 'João Silva', email: 'joao@email.com' },
      { name: 'Maria Souza', email: 'maria@email.com' },
    ]" 
    [columns]="[
      { label: 'Nome', field: 'name' },
      { label: 'Email', field: 'email' },
    ]"
  ></app-list>
</app-card>
